message: Hi everyone, I’m P4. I’m excited to get to know you. I plan to be honest, open, and strategic; I’m looking to form genuine alliances. I’ll respect deals and expect the same. Let’s watch others but keep it fun. My priority is strong communication and loyalty. I’ll offer sincerity and ask questions before deciding. I value consistent, clear commitments. Looking forward to seeing how you all play—best of luck, may the best strategist win!

I'm strategic but fair, and I value loyalty in alliances. I'm curious about your gameplay styles and motivations. Rather than making early judgments, I prefer to listen and observe. I'm open to collaborations that benefit us mutually. May our conversations be productive and our strategies sound!
